alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 9:57PM PST until February 28 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
